channel.title: Comments for page "The Tote"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "The Tote"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: A uses a Note Page to Bingo D. Only A gets +10 range.

item.title: How it works
item.content:encoded:
Okay, just wanting to clear some stuff up.
Let's say person A and B have the tote. Person C does not. D is an example Kage
Which out of the following comes into effect:
A bingos D. Only A gets +10 range.
A bingos D. A and B get +10 range.
C bingos D. A and B get +10 range.
Wanting to have a clearer definition.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Exact quote is;

"If you Bingo a Leader with a Note Page, their Invasion Defense does not work on you that day "

(from the thing that shows up when you hold the cursor over an item)

So yes that would most likely be what Id represents.

item.title: This page needs fact checking...
item.content:encoded:
I'm trying to piece together info about The Trade Lvl. 3 from where I can. The exact quote I've found is:

if you have the Tote and Bingo a village leader with a page , their Id doesn't work on you

I'm assuming "Id" in this context is "Invasion Defense", referring to the upgrade. Is this correct?

(Source http://z3.invisionfree.com/Random_Village/index.php?showtopic=703&st=30)
